price: (78) Did they not know that Allāh knows their secrets and their private conversations and that Allāh is the Knower of the unseen?
arabic: أَلَمۡ يَعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعۡلَمُ سِرَّهُمۡ وَنَجۡوَىٰهُمۡ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَّٰمُ ٱلۡغُيُوبِ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: alam yaʿlamū anna al-laha yaʿlamu sirrahum wanajwāhum wa-anna al-laha ʿallāmu al-ghuyūbi
